resources.string: Only Qxpress partner driver can use the application
Qdrive app logout at 11:59pm every day.
To use Qdrive, Qoo10 Live app should be installed on your phone.
Location is off.\nYou should turn on Location.
Sorry, DB encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Qdrive is updated to v%1$s\nYour Qdrive versions is v%2$s\nYour version will be upgraded.
You have attempted to login from unauthorized mobile phone.\nIf your mobile phone was changed, you have to pass the SMS verification.
Your Qdrive account has been deactivated.
Sorry, your sign-in information is not valid. Please try again with your correct ID and password.
